name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data. The playbook outlines steps to remediate the attack.

action--d4359ea6-9c9c-46f6-9558-1bd1fc09.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--d4359ea6-9c9c-46f6-9558-1bd1fc09.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes associated with the malicious scripts.

action--3fa1c9b5-8fce-404c-ba4b-1a5ec8db.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--3fa1c9b5-8fce-404c-ba4b-1a5ec8db.description: Disconnect the compromised host from the network to prevent further data exfiltration.

if-condition--8a15f8a5-aad4-470d-9e7e-2f.name: Conduct full system scan for malware

loop--8a15f8a5-aad4-470d-9e7e-2fe7821f65.name: Repeat malware scan until clean
loop--8a15f8a5-aad4-470d-9e7e-2fe7821f65.description: Continue performing the system scan until no malware is detected.

action--8a15f8a5-aad4-470d-9e7e-2fe7821f.name: Conduct full system scan
action--8a15f8a5-aad4-470d-9e7e-2fe7821f.description: Perform a full system scan for malware.

action--ac3914ef-d62f-4cb4-8438-61c4b4af.name: Review and analyze alert logs
action--ac3914ef-d62f-4cb4-8438-61c4b4af.description: Examine alert logs for suspicious activity.

if-condition--c8a5459c-f06e-46e0-8abc-7a.name: Ensure all systems are updated and patched

action--c8a5459c-f06e-46e0-8abc-7a9ea8f0.name: System Update
action--c8a5459c-f06e-46e0-8abc-7a9ea8f0.description: Update all systems to the latest security patches.
